text:
To get gnome-vfs to work properly with mod_Dav you need to have the same kludge
that has been added for "Microsoft Data Access Internet Publishing Provider". 
If this line could be added to the initial config it would prevent a lot of
difficulties using DAV and gnome-vfs together.

The line that needs to be added:

BrowserMatch "^gnome-vfs" redirect-carefully
creator: rconover@infogears.com

text:
This has been committed to the default conf files and will be in the next
release.

Thanks for your report, and thanks for using Apache!
creator: trawick@apache.org
